BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

Items.Title: Oversight - New York City Board of Correction Proposed Amendments to the Minimum Standards for New York City Correctional Facilities
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York City Board of Correction Proposed Amendments to the Minimum Standards for New York City Correctional Facilities

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of certified birth certificates for certain people being released from a New York city or state correctional facility.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: The abolition of fees for certified birth certificates for any person who is being released from a NYS correctional facility, after any duration, and any person who is being released from a NYC jail after at least 90 consecutive days of incarceration.

Items.Title: Oversight - New York City Board of Correction Proposed Amendments to the Minimum Standards for New York City Correctional Facilities
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - New York City Board of Correction Proposed Amendments to the Minimum Standards for New York City Correctional Facilities

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of certified birth certificates for certain people being released from a New York city or state correctional facility.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: The abolition of fees for certified birth certificates for any person who is being released from a NYS correctional facility, after any duration, and any person who is being released from a NYC jail after at least 90 consecutive days of incarceration.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Palma and James
